title: Four shuttle plane cam type circular loom US-ZD-PC-4/750
title_uz: Polipropilen qop materialini to'qish uskunasi US-ZD-PC-4/750
title_ru: Оборудование для плетения полипропиленового мешочного материала US-ZD-PC-4/750
title_en: Four shuttle plane cam type circular loom US-ZD-PC-4/750
short_description: At the very beginning of the production of polypropylene bags, threads are produced for weaving the material of these bags. Then, long rolls of material for bags are woven from these threads. This US-ZD-PC-4/750 equipment weaves just such materials. Woven materials are sewn and cut to form bags. This equipment with 4 weaving shuttles has a power of 2.7 kW and the weaving speed reaches 1.4-1.8 m per minute. The weight of the equipment is 1900 kg and its dimensions are 8300*2200*2730 mm.
short_description_uz: Polipropilen qoplar ishlab chiqarishni eng avvalida shu qoplar materialini to'qish uchun iplar ishlab chiqariladi. So'ngra esa shu iplardan qoplar uchun uzun rulonli material to'qiladi. Ushbu US-ZD-PC-4/750 uskuna aynan shunday materiallarni to'qib beradi. To'qilgan materiallar esa tikilib, kesilib qoplar hosil qilinadi. 4 ta to'quvchi mexanizmga ega bo'lgan ushbu uskuna 2.7 kW quvvatga ega va to'qish tezligi esa daqiqasiga 1.4-1.8 m gacha yetadi. Uskuna vazni 1900 kg va o'lchamlari 8300*2200*2730 mm ni tashkil qiladi.
short_description_ru: В самом начале производства полипропиленовых мешков производятся нити для плетения материала этих мешков. Затем из этих ниток плетут длинные рулоны материала для  мешок. Данное US-ZD-PC-4/750 оборудование ткет именно такие материалы. Тканые материалы сшивают и разрезают на мешки. Это оборудование с 4-мя ткацкими механизмами имеет мощность 2,7 кВт, а скорость плетения достигает 1,4-1,8 м в минуту. Вес оборудования 1900 кг, габариты 8300*2200*2730 мм.
short_description_en: At the very beginning of the production of polypropylene bags, threads are produced for weaving the material of these bags. Then, long rolls of material for bags are woven from these threads. This US-ZD-PC-4/750 equipment weaves just such materials. Woven materials are sewn and cut to form bags. This equipment with 4 weaving shuttles has a power of 2.7 kW and the weaving speed reaches 1.4-1.8 m per minute. The weight of the equipment is 1900 kg and its dimensions are 8300*2200*2730 mm.
long_description:
At the very beginning of the production of polypropylene bags, threads are produced for weaving the material of these bags. Then, long rolls of material for bags are woven from these threads. This US-ZD-PC-4/750 equipment weaves just such materials. Woven materials are sewn and cut to form bags. This equipment with 4 weaving shuttles has a power of 2.7 kW and the weaving speed reaches 1.4-1.8 m per minute. The weight of the equipment is 1900 kg and its dimensions are 8300*2200*2730 mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-ZD-PC-4/750
Number of shuttle........................................................................................... 4 ta..............................................................................................
Folding width of weaving 350-750 mm
Max. number of warp 768
Rotational speed of main motor  140-180 rpm
Production speed 1.4-1.8 m/min
Main motor power 1.5 / 2.2 kW
Total power 2 / 2.7 kW
Weight 1900 kg
Dimension 8300*2200*2730 mm
long_description_uz:
Polipropilen qoplar ishlab chiqarishni eng avvalida shu qoplar materialini to'qish uchun iplar ishlab chiqariladi. So'ngra esa shu iplardan qoplar uchun uzun rulonli material to'qiladi. Ushbu US-ZD-PC-4/750 uskuna aynan shunday materiallarni to'qib beradi. To'qilgan materiallar esa tikilib, kesilib qoplar hosil qilinadi. 4 ta to'quvchi mexanizmga ega bo'lgan ushbu uskuna 2.7 kW quvvatga ega va to'qish tezligi esa daqiqasiga 1.4-1.8 m gacha yetadi. Uskuna vazni 1900 kg va o'lchamlari 8300*2200*2730 mm ni tashkil qiladi.

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-ZD-PC-4/750
To'quvchi mexanizmlar................................................................................. 4 ta..............................................................................................
To'qish kengligi 350-750 mm
Maks. o'rashlar soni 768
Asosiy motor tezligi 140-180 oborot/min
To'qish tezligi 1.4-1.8 m/min
Asosiy motor quvvati 1.5 / 2.2 kW
Uskunaning umumiy quvvati 2 / 2.7 kW
Uskuna vazni 1900 kg
O'lchamlari 8300*2200*2730 mm
long_description_ru:
В самом начале производства полипропиленовых мешков производятся нити для плетения материала этих мешков. Затем из этих ниток плетут длинные рулоны материала для  мешок. Данное US-ZD-PC-4/750 оборудование ткет именно такие материалы. Тканые материалы сшивают и разрезают на мешки. Это оборудование с 4-мя ткацкими механизмами имеет мощность 2,7 кВт, а скорость плетения достигает 1,4-1,8 м в минуту. Вес оборудования 1900 кг, габариты 8300*2200*2730 мм.

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-ZD-PC-4/750
Ткацкие механизмы................................................................................. 4 ta..............................................................................................
Ширина вязания 350-750 мм
Макс. количество обмоток 768
Скорость основного двигателя 140-180 об/мин
Скорость вязания 1.4-1.8 м/мин
Мощность главного двигателя 1.5 / 2.2 кВт
Общая мощность оборудования 2 / 2.7 кВт
Вес оборудования 1900 кг
Размеры 8300*2200*2730 мм
long_description_en:
At the very beginning of the production of polypropylene bags, threads are produced for weaving the material of these bags. Then, long rolls of material for bags are woven from these threads. This US-ZD-PC-4/750 equipment weaves just such materials. Woven materials are sewn and cut to form bags. This equipment with 4 weaving shuttles has a power of 2.7 kW and the weaving speed reaches 1.4-1.8 m per minute. The weight of the equipment is 1900 kg and its dimensions are 8300*2200*2730 mm.

 

Basic parameters
Model US-ZD-PC-4/750
Number of shuttle........................................................................................... 4 ta..............................................................................................
Folding width of weaving 350-750 mm
Max. number of warp 768
Rotational speed of main motor  140-180 rpm
Production speed 1.4-1.8 m/min
Main motor power 1.5 / 2.2 kW
Total power 2 / 2.7 kW
Weight 1900 kg
Dimension 8300*2200*2730 mm
